      • getFileMD5

        public static java.lang.String getFileMD5(java.lang.String filePath)
        Get MD5 hash value of a file. The value is used to verify the integrity of the file after uploading.
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path
        Returns:
        MD5 hash in string format

      • createDirectory

        Create a directory on file system
        Parameters:
        dir - name of the directory, can be absolute of relative.
        Returns:
        true/false as operation result

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • unzipFile

        public static int unzipFile(java.lang.String zipfilePath,
            java.lang.String targetDirectory)
        Unzip a zip file to a target directory
        Parameters:
        zipfilePath - the file path of the zip file
        targetDirectory - the target directory of the output
        Returns:
        equal or larger than 0 - number of files extracted
        -21 zip format not supported
        -22 zip file not valid
        -23 zip file cannot be read due to security reason -24 cannot create target directory
